text: How are you, Sam! Getting ready for the Ironman World Champs?
I'm good, good. Just finished a solid swim session to prepare for the swim leg.
What about you? How's your bike and run training going?
Good as well, preparing for a swim now. Just finished an awful bike ride in the hills.
How's your nutrition plan coming along? Proper fueling is crucial for endurance events like the Ironman.
Absolutely! I've been focusing on carbo loading in the mornings and at lunch, and getting my veggies and fibre in at dinner.
Have you incorporated any strength training into your routine? It can enhance overall performance and reduce the risk of injuries.
I've started adding some strength workouts, especially focusing on core stability. I haven't been doing enough unfortunately.
How's your mental preparation? Dealing with the mental challenges during an Ironman is just as crucial as physical training.
Absolutely, Sam! I've been visualizing myself during the event, I'm going to get emotional for sure.
It sounds like you're on the right track. What's your race-day strategy for nutrition and pacing?
Absolutely ram in the carbs and protein the week leading up to the race. Pacing-wise, aiming for a steady effort throughout.
That sounds solid! Let me know if you need any support. You've got this!
